Action.author: cotofei
Action.body: In lscc in checkInstantiationPolicy *common.SignedData not include signs from SignedCDSPackage

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~cotofei As Proposal supports only single signers (currently) InstantiationPolicies are limited to successful evaluation based in single signer. All your succesful cases ("OR ('Org1MSP.member','Org2MSP.member')", "AND ('Org1MSP.admin')", "AND ('Org2MSP.admin')" ) fall into that category. The failure case ("AND ('Org1MSP.member','Org2MSP.member')") requires two signers which is not currently supported.
